locked.description: Whether the configuration is not allowed to be overriden or extended.

lineWidth.description: The width of a line the printer will try to stay under. Note that the printer may exceed this width in certain cases.

indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false).

newLineKind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).

cacheKey.description: Optional value used to bust dprint's incremental cache (ex. provide "1"). This is useful if you want to force formatting to occur because the underlying command has changed.

timeout.description: Number of seconds to allow a format to progress before a timeout error occurs.

^.*\\.associations$.description: The pattern to use to match a file path. Ex. "rustfmt.associations": "**/*.rs"

^.*\\.cwd$.description: The current working directory to launch the executable with.

^.*\\.stdin$.description: Whether to pass the file text in via stdin.

additionalProperties.description: Definition for a plugin command. Define the name and command with arguments to execute. Ex. `"rustfmt": "rustfmt"`
